parameters.name: ScheduledActionName
parameters.description: The name of the scheduled action to modify.

parameters.name: TargetAction
parameters.description: A modified JSON format of the scheduled action. For more information about this parameter, see  ScheduledAction. ResizeCluster (dict) --- An action that runs a ResizeCluster API operation. The unique identifier for the cluster to resize. ClusterType (string) --- The new cluster type for the specified cluster. NodeType (string) --- The new node type for the nodes you are adding. If not specified, the cluster's current node type is used. NumberOfNodes (integer) --- The new number of nodes for the cluster. If not specified, the cluster's current number of nodes is used. Classic (boolean) --- A boolean value indicating whether the resize operation is using the classic resize process. If you don't provide this parameter or set the value to false, the resize type is elastic. ReservedNodeId (string) --- The identifier of the reserved node. TargetReservedNodeOfferingId (string) --- The identifier of the target reserved node offering. PauseCluster (dict) --- An action that runs a PauseCluster API operation. The identifier of the cluster to be paused. ResumeCluster (dict) --- An action that runs a ResumeCluster API operation. The identifier of the cluster to be resumed.

nested_items.description: The name of the scheduled action.

nested_items.description: A JSON format string of the Amazon Redshift API operation with input parameters.

nested_items.description: An action that runs a ResizeCluster API operation.

nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the cluster to resize.

nested_items.name: ClusterType
nested_items.description: The new cluster type for the specified cluster.

nested_items.name: NodeType
nested_items.description: The new node type for the nodes you are adding. If not specified, the cluster's current node type is used.

nested_items.name: NumberOfNodes
nested_items.description: The new number of nodes for the cluster. If not specified, the cluster's current number of nodes is used.

nested_items.description: The identifier of the cluster to be resumed.

nested_items.name: Schedule
nested_items.description: The schedule for a one-time (at format) or recurring (cron format) scheduled action. Schedule invocations must be separated by at least one hour.

nested_items.name: IamRole
nested_items.description: The IAM role to assume to run the scheduled action. This IAM role must have permission to run the Amazon Redshift API operation in the scheduled action. This IAM role must allow the Amazon Redshift scheduler (Principal scheduler.redshift.amazonaws.com) to assume permissions on your behalf. For more information about the IAM role to use with the Amazon Redshift scheduler, see Using Identity-Based Policies for Amazon Redshift in the Amazon Redshift Cluster Management Guide.

nested_items.name: ScheduledActionDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the scheduled action.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the scheduled action. For example, DISABLED.

nested_items.name: NextInvocations
nested_items.description: List of times when the scheduled action will run.
(datetime) ---

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The start time in UTC when the schedule is active. Before this time, the scheduled action does not trigger.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The end time in UTC when the schedule is no longer active. After this time, the scheduled action does not trigger.
